Texts: This is it. The Labyrinth Castle.
Looks like some monster came to welcome you. Get rid of it before it's too late.

(You have two ways of attacking. Regular attacks are sure to hit and deal a regular amount of damage. You can also attempt a critical hit. Critical hit won't always succeed but deals great damage if it lands.)
You may be wondering, why is it called the Labyrinth Castle? Well, you see, this place is like a labyrinth.
You have two paths ahead of you. There is no map available, so just trust your gut and choose. Which way will you go?
What is the best way to kill monsters made of sweets? Using something salty, of course.
Luckily for you, you found a very salty and very deadly weapon. Pick it up and continue.
Oh, a monster. You know what to do.
Oh, a monster. You know what to do.
What is the best way to kill monsters made of sweets? Using something salty, of course.
Luckily for you, you found a very salty and very deadly weapon. Pick it up and continue.
You found a shield.
You know what shields are for, right? Surely you don’t expect me to explain basic stuff like that to you, right?
Getting hit by the sweet monsters increases your diabetes level. Make sure it never fills up, because you sure don't want to die.
Now, which door will you choose?
Would you look at that! Food!
Eating something salty will lower your diabetes level a bit. Try it out.
This fucker really thinks he stands a chance, huh?
Show him who’s the boss here.
This fucker really thinks he stands a chance, huh?
Show him who’s the boss here.
Would you look at that! Food!
Eating something salty will lower your diabetes level a bit. Try it out.
Well, you sure ain’t a pushover. But neither are they, so don’t let it get to your head, ‘kay?
Also, you got a new weapon. Isn’t that great?
Most of the food around here is sweet, of course. But even sweet food can help you.
Eating sweets will increase your diabetes level, but it will also heal you. It’s worth the risk, trust me.
Oh, the monsters are grouping up now.
That just means they are weak.
Wipe the floor with them and continue.
Just do whatever you want, I’m tired of telling you what to do.
Even the narrator needs to take a break sometimes, you know?
Those poor children are eternally grateful for what you did today.
And look, you got a reward for your hard work – a new shield.
There are two doors before you. And because I am a very generous narrator, I will tell you what lies behind each door.
The room on the left contains some sweet food. The one on the right contains something salty.
See? I told you.
See? I told you.
Look, this poor guy is probably a servant of the nobles.
What’s the best way to piss of a noble?
Killing their servant, of course!
Look, this poor guy is probably a servant of the nobles.
What’s the best way to piss of a noble?
Killing their servant, of course!
This guy is probably guarding some special place.
Make a hole in his chest! Oh… Sorry, my bad. Just kill him.
You realize you took a detour. You are starting to feel exhausted and hungry.
Luckily for you, there is some food in this room. Talk about perfect timing!
You found a nice shield that goes well with your new weapon. You are such a lucky guy.
This was the happiest moment of his life.
As a reward for making his wish come true, he gave you this fancy weapon.
And now, he even lost his life. Pathetic.
The only thing that’s left of him is this fancy weapon.
See that guy over there? That’s one of the emperor’s royal guards.
Get rid of him real quick. If you can, that is.
I have nothing to say. Just do your thing.
I have nothing to say. Just do your thing.
Another royal guard.
But that just means the emperor is weak if he relies so much on his guards, right?
Another royal guard.
But that just means the emperor is weak if he relies so much on his guards, right?
There is no end to them, is there?
Those idiots really left such a powerful weapon just lying on the floor here, huh? Well, that works in your favor.
